Articles.Content:
A very compact single-launch-mission-to-Dres craft capable of landing and return! Loaded with even more snacks than the Duna explorer for added survivability of the 5 year long trip to Dres and back!

For complete guide how to and how-not-to use this craft - click the link below!

Cryogenic Engines Pack mode is essential for this craft. It does not use any of the engines but using it will allow you do swap the fuel tank configuration for Liquid Fuel only! You do not need the oxydizer for the nuclear engines in 1.0.2!

see Dres Explorer Mk1 on KerbalX.com

Edited May 6, 2015 by iVG
